Text: Our tree trimming storeyBryan and I decided to start putting up the Christmas decorations this week Sunday we got the tree out of the closet and set that up in the living room Our plan was to do a little bit every night By Thanksgiving we would have a beautifully decorated house On Monday Bryan put the lights on the tree Then I started unwrapping some of the ornaments just to look at them Well after I unwrapped all of the ornaments we decided to finish trimming the tree Bryan was hanging back and letting me do most of the decorating Though I did notice that one of the first ornaments that he put on the tree was my heart shaped Nicole ornament After we finished we sat in the glow of the big bulb lights and admired our tree That was when Bryan informed me that I did not find my NEW ornament He had put something new on one of the trees we have a charlie brown tree in the bedroom and the big tree in the living room I could not find anything new on the charlie brown tree so I moved to the big tree After surveying the big tree for a few moments the little girl in me said Look for a ring look for a ring But the practical side of me said Find the ornament Well just about then I found a beautiful diamond ring hanging from the heart shaped Nicole ornament My engagement ring had been on the tree the entire time I was so focused on the decorating that I never saw it Bryan has since been teasing me that any other woman would have known right away that there was a diamond ring on the tree I am very happy and excited to tell everyone that Bryan and I are engaged to be married We do not have a date time place or even a ctiy yet I just couldnt wait to tell everyone I know that I will be wearing a big smile for a long long time Happy Holidays Nicole

RE Our tree trimming storeyThanks We will be in town on December th We are going to try to visit some reception sites and see everybody I dont know exactly how but we are going to try Diane can probably update you with more details as it gets closer I want to look at some places near Katy I am going to try to look at the Equestrian Center and maybe the Cinco Ranch Country Club if it lets nonmembers use their facility I am going to try to have a allinone place Ceremony and Reception But I may have to find a church Who knows right now Hopefully we will see you soon I want to see ERIN Tell Pat that I said HI Nicole Kuykendall Tori Tori NRONcom on AM To Nicole L Pritula i DScom cc Subject RE Our tree trimming storey CONGRATULATIONS Im all teary eyed I knew you picked a good one Original Message From Nicole L Pritula mailtoi DScom Sent Monday November AM To Kuykendall Tori Subject Our tree trimming storey Bryan and I decided to start putting up the Christmas decorations this week Sunday we got the tree out of the closet and set that up in the living room Our plan was to do a little bit every night By Thanksgiving we would have a beautifully decorated house On Monday Bryan put the lights on the tree Then I started unwrapping some of the ornaments just to look at them Well after I unwrapped all of the ornaments we decided to finish trimming the tree Bryan was hanging back and letting me do most of the decorating Though I did notice that one of the first ornaments that he put on the tree was my heart shaped Nicole ornament After we finished we sat in the glow of the big bulb lights and admired our tree That was when Bryan informed me that I did not find my NEW ornament He had put something new on one of the trees we have a charlie brown tree in the bedroom and the big tree in the living room I could not find anything new on the charlie brown tree so I moved to the big tree After surveying the big tree for a few moments the little girl in me said Look for a ring look for a ring But the practical side of me said Find the ornament Well just about then I found a beautiful diamond ring hanging from the heart shaped Nicole ornament My engagement ring had been on the tree the entire time I was so focused on the decorating that I never saw it Bryan has since been teasing me that any other woman would have known right away that there was a diamond ring on the tree I am very happy and excited to tell everyone that Bryan and I are engaged to be married We do not have a date time place or even a ctiy yet I just couldnt wait to tell everyone I know
